content.text: Pretty good, I am just trying to figure out what to do with my life.
I have always been interested in photography, but I am not sure if I want to make it my career.
That's a great hobby! I have always been interested in acting, but I am not sure if I want to make it my career either.
What's stopping you from pursuing it?
I am not sure if I am good enough and I am also afraid of failing.
I think you should go for it! I am sure you are good enough and everyone fails at some point in their lives.
Thank you for the encouragement! I might just give it a try.
I am glad I could help! What kind of acting are you interested in?
I am not sure, I have always been interested in theater and film.
Both are great options! I am sure you would be great at either one.
